nodes.text: Sector five was a location on the planet Ryloth, situated just outside the capital city of Lessu and containing a large rock spire. The sector had an excellent vantage point into the city, and it was used by Clone Force 99, Hera Syndulla and Chopper to scout out Lessu while planning to rescue Syndulla's parents. However, a Galactic Empire probe droid found the group and reported their location before Hunter destroyed it.
